name: Gigya
description: Gigya provides websites with a complete social infrastructure that creates immersive social experiences for users and provides unparalleled customer insights for businesses. Gigya equips businesses like ABC, Pepsi, and Verizon with a comprehensive solution to socialize their online properties.
